title: Ticket #7739: self-checkpointing manual section missing transfer_checkpoint_files
description: Just at TimC praised the self-checkpointing documentation(!), I notice that it doesn't mention the new transfer_checkpoint_files feature.
remarks:
2020-Jul-17 13:07:07 by tlmiller:
OK, this is already in the master-branch docs, but apparently the update didn't happen at the same time transfer_checkpoint_files was added to the condor_submit documentation, and readthedocs.io doesn't have that update.
creator: tlmiller
